name: spectramind-v50-mermaid-export
description: Mermaid diagram rendering/export utilities for SpectraMind V50 (NeurIPS 2025 Ariel Data Challenge). CLI-first, reproducible exports (SVG, PNG, PDF) with CI/Kaggle-safe guardrails.

scripts.diag:render:svg: mmdc --inputDir diagrams --outputDir outputs/diagrams --outputFormat svg -b transparent -t neutral
scripts.diag:render:png: mmdc --inputDir diagrams --outputDir outputs/diagrams --outputFormat png -b transparent -t neutral
scripts.diag:render:pdf: mmdc --inputDir diagrams --outputDir outputs/diagrams --outputFormat pdf -b transparent -t neutral
scripts.diag:render:all: run-s diag:clean diag:render:svg diag:render:png diag:render:pdf diag:optimize
scripts.diag:watch: chokidar "diagrams/**/*.mmd" -c "npm run diag:render:svg && npm run diag:optimize"
